resources.string: Length must be greater than 3 characters
You can enter only digits and Latin letters
The email address is for feedback only (no advertising or spam emails)
Need permission for the app to work correctly. Give permission?
Need permission to pause the player when making calls or playing audio. Give permission?
Your new track is added to the chart!
Enter the name of the track
Are you sure you want to choose this track?
The song is added to your favorite tracks on Deezer ‚ù§
2. Get likes from other users and put yourself
3. Your track got the most likes? You have access to new features of the app!
4. Listen to new music every day and share your tracks with others!

Congratulations, you have successfully chose your track!
About TRACKDEALER app:
All the tracks in one list

This is the best music chosen by you and other users.

This is an opportunity every day to find something new for yourself.

Listen and evaluate tracks, share your favorite music, become the Trackdealer!
The most popular tracks this week are at the top of the list. Once a week, the best are identified and their owners have access to the new features of the app.
Favorite tracks for your Deezer account. To view the list and add your track, you need \n 1. Connect Deezer-account profile\n2. Long click on a favorite track to add to that list.
All tracks of the user. Here you can watch and listen to all their tracks for all the time
The best tracks of users for all time by weeks.
Random selection of tracks, the ability to find something new for yourself.
Connecting to Deezer allows you to add tracks to the playlist "Favorite tracks", and account with status PREMIUM or PREMIUM+ allows you to listen to full tracks
You can listen to full songs and add your favorite tracks to the playlist Favorite tracks
You can add tracks to your favorite tracks playlist, but you can\'t listen to full tracks (requires PREMIUM or PREMIUM+status)
Do you really want to disable your Deezer account?
You are logged in to Deezer!
You got access to new opportunities!
Congratulations! Your track is among the best this week! It\'s time to choose a new track and get back to the best
For the status of TRACELISTENER are limited:\n - listen to the best tracks of all time \n - get random tracks and hear something new
TRACKLISTENER - your basic status in the app
TRACKMASTER - Enter the promo code that is available to users with basic status and get the status and access to all features of the application
TRACKKING - You\'ll get this status when your track is the best
TRACKDEALER - Your tracks are so good that users have chosen the best at least three of your songs!
Really want to go out TrackDealer?\n\nyou will be automatically logged out of your Deezer account.
Best tracks are only available to users with status TRACKDEALER.\n\n Details: Profile - > Status Information.
Random track list are only available to users with status TRACKDEALER.\n\n Details: Profile - > Status Information.
You have skipped too many tracks in this radio. Skip will be disabled for a while

The Deezer account is used on multiple devices at once.

Unknown error. Check your Internet connection.
Unable to get a list of favorite songs.
